X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=140463140
X-Yahoo-Profile: warriorazure

The instant the communications came back, the alarm rang loud in the 
Tripredacus Base.

Tyrael: Darkangel! Forget the mission I just gave you! I'll need you 
here! Unicron is here! Call back Deathstar or Dreadplague, just make 
sure one stays with the gun!

The radar revealed a massive amount of Minions surrounding the 
planetoid giant.

Tyrael: Good Matrix! How can this be? Weren't the three of them 
powerful enough? (He opened a commlink with both Maximals and 
Predacons) Hydras, Rodimus, this is Tyrael. The time for our 
greatest battle has come!
